title.main: RePKG GUI - Wallpaper Engine Package Extractor

extract.title: Wallpaper Extraction
extract.drag_drop: Click here to batch select .pkg files
extract.ensure_path: Please ensure Steam Workshop path exists and contains wallpaper files

settings.title: Settings
settings.auto_create_folder_desc: Automatically create a folder for each extracted package
settings.image_only_desc: Extract only images and videos, ignore other files
settings.no_convert: Don't convert Tex files to images
settings.flatten_structure_desc: Place all files in the same directory level
settings.overwrite_existing_desc: Overwrite files with the same name if they exist in the target folder
settings.open_after_extract_desc: Automatically open the extraction folder after unpacking is complete

about.title: About RePKG GUI
about.description: A simple and easy-to-use wallpaper engine package extraction tool
about.author: Author

messages.cannot_get_info: Cannot get wallpaper info or extraction path
messages.empty_path: Wallpaper path or extraction path is empty
messages.path_empty: Wallpaper path or extraction path is empty
messages.extract_complete: Extraction completed! Success: {success} files, Failed: {error} files
messages.steam_not_found: Cannot find Steam or Wallpaper Engine installation path, please ensure Wallpaper Engine is installed
messages.enter_workshop_id: Please enter the Workshop ID (number) of the wallpaper:
messages.invalid_workshop_id: Please enter a valid Workshop ID
messages.wallpaper_editor_not_loaded: Wallpaper Editor import function not loaded
messages.desktop_only: This feature is only available in the desktop application

workshop.title: Workshop Path
workshop.hint: Tip: You can enter a basic path like D:/Steam, or a partial path like E:/Game/Steam/steamapps, and the system will automatically complete it to the full path
workshop.placeholder: You can enter a basic path like D:/Steam, auto-complete full path

background.title: Custom Background
background.invalid_url: Please enter a valid image or video URL
background.load_failed: Background loading failed, please check if the URL is correct
